name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A network information security detection system for military and civilian use released by a domestic technology company. It uses artificial intelligence and big data analysis technology to monitor user behavior. Figure 1, "Network Trace Detection System", claims that it uses artificial intelligence and big data analysis technology to achieve network trace detection, application app evidence collection, key personnel monitoring and other functions. It can even sniff out the registration behavior of Apple mobile phone users on overseas websites

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The recent situation has made economist Guan Qingyou, who has always been known as "The Riddler", unable to hold his nerve...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: During the event, supporters tried to block the protesters' flags and banners with giant national flags.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 13, a video titled "A mother was treated rudely and told to get out by Li Zhanfei, director of the trauma surgery department at Wuhan Tongji Hospital, when she asked the doctor about her child who was diagnosed with brain death" was uploaded by netizens on the domestic Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/CRqaXklPxX

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 14, Luo Qiang, Vice Governor of Guizhou Province, announced that after Guizhou won the battle against poverty, by the end of last year, the population with an annual per capita net income of less than 10,000 yuan had basically been dynamically eliminated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The G7 leaders' summit held in Italy issued a joint statement on Friday (June 14) 
The statement pointed out that China's continued support for Russia's defense industrial base enables Russia to maintain its illegal war in Ukraine, calling on China to stop transferring materials including weapons parts and equipment. 
Countries will further impose restrictive measures on entities, including financial institutions, that facilitate the procurement of items or equipment for Russia's defense industrial base.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today is Xi Jinping’s 71st birthday.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 14, Nanjing. Ping An Bank employees hold banners to protest against the bank's illegal layoffs

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 15, a video of a staff member of the Tobacco Bureau of Maiji District, Tianshui City, forging evidence was leaked.
In order to respond to the lawsuit, the Tobacco Bureau went to the plaintiff Ruan Shuangquan's original rural business premises twice at 6 o'clock in the morning on May 29 and 31, posted the recall notice and delivery receipt from three years ago, took photos and tore them down immediately after posting. They then handed the photos to the judge of the administrative case, saying that they were taken in 2021.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 15, property owners of Suzhou Huayu Lanyuan Community protested for their rights, and a large number of special police were on the scene to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the First Clinical Medical College of Southern Medical University reported that a teacher was late for class for 29 minutes because of rescuing a sick child. The school punished him by withholding his May bonus, criticizing him, and canceling his qualification for this year's evaluation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 15, Sichuan. A teenage girl was reported online to be slashing around on the street with a knife and was then subdued by a crowd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 14, Gushi County, Henan Province. A man posted a video saying that his daughter committed suicide on the 10th, leaving behind only boxes of textbooks and a thick stack of test papers. The man said that he regretted very much that he did not teach his children to let go of the pressure of studying. He hoped that the school and parents would pay attention to this and not pursue their children's grades too much and not oppress them too much.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 14, Shenzhen, Guangdong. Taxi drivers called the city government hotline and complained: We can’t even make a penny in more than an hour, and there are many people who make two or three hundred yuan a day. We are young guys, and now we have white hair on both sides of our hair. Please give us a bowl of rice to eat, okay?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 14, blogger "Reporter A" revealed that many places in Sichuan have suddenly begun to force people within the system to undergo HIV tests, and health departments have brought testing reagents to every unit in the county for screening.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, CCTV News reported that another water pipe burst in Atlanta, USA, causing difficulty for residents to drink water. This triggered ridicule from netizens.
Netizens jokingly said that CCTV "spared no effort to conduct public opinion supervision and help American people solve livelihood problems"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 13, Ningbo Bohui Chemical Technology Co., Ltd. announced that the local taxation department required the company to collect consumption tax on its "heavy aromatics derivatives" according to the "heavy aromatics", which would affect the company's annual profit by about 300 million yuan, causing the company's performance to turn from profit to a large loss. Therefore, it had to suspend production of related supporting production equipment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 14, many places in Henan finally welcomed a short rainfall. The villagers could hardly contain their inner joy. A local farmer danced with joy and knelt down to kowtow to thank God.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 15, some institutional units in Guangdong received a notice that they had to return a portion of the maternity insurance and wages received during maternity leave.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the northern part of Anhui has not seen effective rainfall for more than a month. The surface temperature is close to 40 degrees. The farmland is dry and cracked, making it impossible to plant crops such as soybeans and corn. An elderly man fainted while farming, suspected of heat stroke. Until the 14th, the long-awaited rainfall finally arrived in the area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 14, Xuzhou, Jiangsu. A delivery boy came back from delivering food and found that the food he had not yet delivered had been stolen. The boy broke down and cried.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 13, the China Conservation and Research Center for the Giant Panda released a video in which experts at the center were recently scolded by a group of panda conservationists. The article stated that in recent days, more than 10 personnel at the center's Dujiangyan Base and Shenshuping Base spread false information such as pandas being abused, distributed fans and other materials and deliberately fell to the ground to mislead the uninformed public, and contacted the media and overseas self-media on site to spread false information to discredit panda breeding management, scientific research cooperation and protection.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 13, Chengdu, Sichuan. A large number of panda protection activists held banners in front of the Dujiangyan Giant Panda Base to protest the base's decision to send giant pandas to the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/K7OrOxEKy6

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 14, in Ning'an, Heilongjiang, taxi drivers went on strike and came to the municipal government to defend their rights. According to the drivers, local electric tricycles carried passengers without license plates and certificates, which took away the business of taxi drivers. They also ran red lights and changed lanes on solid lines, which caused dissatisfaction among drivers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 14, Putian, Fujian. China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation has been in arrears of wages for migrant workers for three months. The workers went to the municipal government to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A bookstore in Hangzhou

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, it was reported online that Shanghai Youta Games has forced employees to work overtime from Tuesday to Thursday until 21:00 since April, without any overtime compensation, but only Chinese employees are subject to this rule, with Taiwanese and foreign employees being exceptions.
An employee posted the Labor Law in the group to question the person in charge, but the person in charge withdrew the message and removed him from all groups.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 14, it was reported online that Jilin Bank, Changchun Rural Commercial Bank, Changchun Development Bank, and Yanbian Rural Commercial Bank will join the Russian payment system and share the ruble channel of Hunchun Bank.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of June 15, some netizens reported that several urban management personnel in Longshan County, Xiangxi, Hunan Province, had a disagreement with merchants, and a man was pressed to the ground and punched and kicked.
People familiar with the matter said that the incident took place on Beizheng Street in Longshan County, and the merchant who was beaten was a bacon business. The local police station said that the police had received a report on the incident. The Longshan County Government said that the relevant situation is being investigated and dealt with.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 14, a blacklist of Japanese visa regions circulated online showed that due to the recent high incidence of tourists illegally staying in Japan, relevant departments have issued a summary of high-risk groups and areas with high incidence of tourists illegally staying in Japan to businesses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @torontobigface Modi doesn’t understand that green mountains and clear waters are as valuable as gold and silver.
